verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus Has Died For You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Maybe your life seems so hopeless

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And you think that life is unfair

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Maybe you feel such emptiness

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And feels that nobody would even care

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Or maybe right now, you’re too discouraged

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: That you want to give up your life

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Oh, please forget all your worries and fears

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: And do not lose your faith yet

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: For Jesus has died for you

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Yes that’s how much He really loves you

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: He gave His life for you

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: ‘cause He wants to save you that is true

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: All you have to do is repent of your sins

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Believe in Jesus’ name

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Let Him come to your heart

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Let Him live within

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Make Him as your only Saviour

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Then he’ll give you new life…

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: That’s why Jesus had died for you.

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: Maybe you don’t know Who Jesus is

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: And you think that he doesn’t exist

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: Maybe you still have doubts in your mind

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: That you just can’t easily resist

verse.name: v25
verse.lines:
Oh I could prove to you that my Jesus is true
And my God is real that He could save you, too

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: He has power to make your life brand new

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: My friends this is what I want you to know.

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: That Jesus has died for you

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: All you have to do is…”Repent of your sins

verse.name: v30
verse.lines: That’s why Jesus had died for you”.

verse.name: v31
verse.lines: Jesus has died for you

verse.name: v32
verse.lines: Believe in Jesus’ precious name

verse.name: v33
verse.lines: Jesus

verse.name: v34
verse.lines: Yes, my Jesus
